# bm-input

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                        | Type                                                                       | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `class`        | `class`         | CSS Classes                                                                        | `string`                                                                   | `''`        |
| `color`        | `color`         | Color                                                                              | `"is-danger" or "is-info" or "is-primary" or "is-success" or "is-warning"` | `undefined` |
| `controlClass` | `control-class` | Control Classes                                                                    | `string`                                                                   | `''`        |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`      | Disabled state                                                                     | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `isLoading`    | `is-loading`    | Loading state                                                                      | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `isRounded`    | `is-rounded`    | Rounded                                                                            | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `isStatic`     | `is-static`     | Removes the background, border, shadow, and horizontal padding                     | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `name`         | `name`          | Name                                                                               | `string`                                                                   | `''`        |
| `placeholder`  | `placeholder`   | Placeholder                                                                        | `string`                                                                   | `undefined` |
| `readonly`     | `readonly`      | The input will look similar to a normal one, but is not editable and has no shadow | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `required`     | `required`      | Required                                                                           | `boolean`                                                                  | `false`     |
| `size`         | `size`          | Size                                                                               | `"is-large" or "is-medium" or "is-normal" or "is-small"`                   | `undefined` |
| `state`        | `state`         | State                                                                              | `"is-focused" or "is-hovered"`                                             | `undefined` |
| `type`         | `type`          | Type                                                                               | `"email" or "number" or "password" or "text"`                              | `'text'`    |
| `value`        | `value`         | Value                                                                              | `number or string`                                                         | `undefined` |
